title: a humble request to fill out a survey
selftext:
Hi everyone! 
i’m conducting a research study trying to understand the popularity of true crime media and particularly why many people find it relaxing. it’ll be a HUGE help for me if everyone could take just 5 minutes out of their time and fill this out this survey. 
Thanking you all in advance <3
comments: Why does your form say "page 1 of 5" when there is only one page in the survey?
it is divided into 5 sections to make it easier to fill :)
